sense.name: a formal document signed by many people requesting some course of action
sense.examples: John signed a petition against plans for real estate development next to the lake. The petition will require two thousand more signatures to get on the ballot.

sense.name: a humble request or supplication to a higher authority
sense.examples: Her petition to the king to give clemency to her son was granted. The second act of the opera includes a famous aria, the heroine's petition to god for forgiveness.

sense.name: an application submitted to a court of law to obtain a lawsuit
sense.examples: He was shocked to learn his wife had filed a petition for divorce. They are expected to file a petition against the company as early as next week.
